title: Dashti Salt Dome (Jashk)
content: The Dashti salt dome should be regarded as one of the most beautiful of lranâ€™s salt domes. This dome has emerged from amid the salt anticline near Khoor Moj. Most phenomena seen in the salt domes can be seen all together in this dome: salt falls, salt glacier, chimney rocks and salt crystals, variety of colors in the ores, and surrounding rocks and other various structural forms. From afar, the landscape of this salt dome like a snow-covered mountain is so eye-catching.
